Interface Client

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authorizeReader(java.util.UUID userId, java.util.UUID readerId, java.lang.String recordType)
      Authorize the client specified in `readerId` to read records written by the user given, with the given record type.
      void deleteRecord(java.util.UUID recordId)
      Delete the given record.
      com.memoizrlabs.retrooptional.Optional<ClientInfo> findClientByEmail(java.lang.String email)
      Get information about a client using their email address, if available.
      com.memoizrlabs.retrooptional.Optional<org.abstractj.kalium.keys.PublicKey> getClientKey(java.util.UUID clientId)
      Get the public key for the requested client.
      boolean getFindByEmail()
      Determine if this client can be found using the email address provided during registration.
      java.util.List<java.util.UUID> listReaders(java.util.UUID userId, java.lang.String recordType)
      List clients that can read records of the given type, owned by the user specified (which in all cases should be the ID of the authenticated client).
      java.util.List<Meta> listRecords(int limit, int offset)
      Retrieve Meta information about records shared with or owned by the client.
      java.util.List<Meta> listRecords(int limit, int offset, java.util.List<java.lang.String> types)
      Retrieve Meta information about records shared with or owned by the client, for the given record types.
      java.util.List<Meta> listRecords(int limit, int offset, java.util.UUID writerId)
      Retrieve Meta information about records written by the given writer.
      java.util.List<Meta> listRecords(int limit, int offset, java.util.UUID writerId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> types)
      Retrieve Meta information about records shared with or owned by the client, for the given record types, written by the given writer.
      com.memoizrlabs.retrooptional.Optional<Record> readRawRecord(java.util.UUID recordId)
      Read a given record without decrypting it.
      com.memoizrlabs.retrooptional.Optional<Record> readRawRecord(java.util.UUID recordId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> fields)
      Retrieve the given record and select fields, without decrypting them.
      java.util.List<Record> readRawRecordSet(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> recordIds)
      Read a set of records without decrypting them.
      java.util.List<Record> readRawRecordSet(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> recordIds, java.util.List<java.lang.String> fields)
      Read a set of records, limited to the fields given, without decrypting them.
      com.memoizrlabs.retrooptional.Optional<Record> readRecord(java.util.UUID recordId)
      Read & decrypt the given record.
      com.memoizrlabs.retrooptional.Optional<Record> readRecord(java.util.UUID recordId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> fields)
      Read & decrypt selected fields in the given record.
      java.util.List<Record> readRecordSet(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> recordIds)
      Read & decrypt a set of records.

      Read & decrypt a set of records, limited to the fields given.

      Update a given record.
      void revokeSharing(java.util.UUID userId, java.util.UUID writerId, java.util.UUID readerId)
      Revoke all sharing (of records written by the authenticated client) for the given client combination.

      Retrieve records, optionally with data, limited by a set of filters.

      • revokeSharing

        void revokeSharing(java.util.UUID userId,
                   java.util.UUID writerId,
                   java.util.UUID readerId)
        Revoke all sharing (of records written by the authenticated client) for the given client combination.
        Parameters:
        userId - UUID of the user to whom the data belongs
        writerId - UUID of the client writing the data
        readerId - UUID of the client to whom the data is shared
